name: Functional Testing Standards
description: Interactive features and user flows work correctly

seo.title: Functional Testing Standards v1.0.0 | lksy.org
seo.description: Interactive features and user flows work correctly. Free, open source, version-controlled community standards.

checks.name: All Forms Submit Correctly
checks.description: Do all forms submit successfully to their endpoints?
checks.rationale: Expected value: true. Validation method: manual_review. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: Form Validation Clear and Helpful
checks.description: Are form validation errors clear and helpful?
checks.rationale: Expected value: true. Validation method: manual_review. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: Required Fields Marked
checks.description: Are required form fields clearly marked?
checks.rationale: Expected value: true. Validation method: code_analysis + computer_vision. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: All Links Functional
checks.description: Do all links return successful HTTP status codes? Expected: true (no 404s, 500s). Check link types: Internal links, External links, Anchor links (#section), Email links (mailto:), Phone links (tel:).
checks.rationale: Validation method: code_analysis. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: All Images Load Successfully
checks.description: Do all images load without errors?
checks.rationale: Expected value: true. Validation method: code_analysis + computer_vision. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: Interactive Elements Respond
checks.description: Do interactive elements respond to user actions? Test elements: Buttons, Dropdowns, Modals/dialogs, Accordions, Tabs, Carousels/sliders, Tooltips, Popovers, Toggle switches, Date pickers, Autocomplete fields.
checks.rationale: Expected value: true. Validation method: manual_review. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: Search Functional
checks.description: Does site search work correctly (if present)?
checks.rationale: Expected value: true (if applicable). Validation method: manual_review. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: Filters/Sorting Work
checks.description: Do filters and sorting functions work correctly?
checks.rationale: Expected value: true (if applicable). Validation method: manual_review. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: No JavaScript Errors
checks.description: Are there JavaScript errors in the browser console?
checks.rationale: Expected value: false (no errors). Validation method: code_analysis. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: Cookie Consent Functional
checks.description: Does cookie consent banner function correctly (if applicable)?
checks.rationale: Expected value: true (if applicable). Validation method: manual_review. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: No Spelling Errors
checks.description: Are there spelling errors on the page?
checks.rationale: Expected value: false (no spelling errors). Validation method: manual_review. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: No Grammar Errors
checks.description: Are there grammar errors on the page?
checks.rationale: Expected value: false (no grammar errors). Validation method: manual_review. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: No Lorem Ipsum Placeholder Text
checks.description: Is there "Lorem ipsum" or other placeholder text on the page? Check for patterns: "Lorem ipsum", "dolor sit amet", "consectetur adipiscing", "[Placeholder]", "[Content goes here]", "Lorem", "Ipsum".
checks.rationale: Expected value: false (no Lorem ipsum). Validation method: code_analysis + computer_vision. Based on Functional QA best practices.

checks.name: Content Up-to-Date and Relevant
checks.rationale: Expected value: true. Validation method: manual_review. Based on Functional QA best practices.
